detail_desc: 5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with an extra-high waist and slim legs. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with an extra-high waist and slim legs. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.
Ankle-length jersey trousers with a regular, elasticated waist, side pockets and gently tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder top in lace with a concealed silicone trim at the top and long raglan sleeves. Lined.
Knee-length dress in ribbed jersey with a polo neck and long sleeves.
Coat in woven fabric with narrow notch lapels and no fasteners. Long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, discreet front pockets and a single back vent. Tape-trimmed inner seams. Unlined.
Coat in woven fabric with narrow notch lapels and no fasteners. Long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, discreet front pockets and a single back vent. Tape-trimmed inner seams. Unlined.
Jumpsuit in jersey with draping. Deep V-neck, wrapover top, gathers at the shoulders and long sleeves. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and straight, wide legs.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Top in soft, striped cotton jersey with a text print and long sleeves. Press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Top in supersoft sweatshirt fabric made from a viscose blend with a brushed finish. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with beaded appliqués.
Two necklaces, one in metal with a coin-shaped pendant and one with semi-precious stones. Adjustable length 40.5-48 cm and 38-46 cm.

Lined, non-wired bikini top with wide shoulder straps and a textured plastic ring at the front. Padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and a metal fastener at the back.

Lined, non-wired bikini top with wide shoulder straps and a textured plastic ring at the front. Padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and a metal fastener at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, textured plastic rings at the sides and medium coverage at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, textured plastic rings at the sides and medium coverage at the back.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a chest pocket, short sleeves with roll edges, and short slits in the sides.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a chest pocket, short sleeves with roll edges, and short slits in the sides.
Fully lined, one-shoulder swimsuit with padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support.
Lined triangle bikini top with wide, adjustable shoulder straps and padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Metal fastening at the back.
Lined triangle bikini top with wide, adjustable shoulder straps and padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Metal fastening at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low, V-shaped waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low, V-shaped waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a lace yoke and shoulders.
Top in cotton sweatshirt fabric in a relaxed fit with gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Gold-coloured buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Body in sturdy jersey with a slight sheen. Wide, sparkly stone-trimmed neckline that is low-cut at the back. Press-studs at the crotch.
V-neck body in velour decorated with metal studs. Long puff sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Long-sleeved shirt in cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved shirt in cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved shirt in cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved shirt in cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved shirt in cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved shirt in cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved shirt in cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.

Short shirt dress in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with a collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets with a button. Seam with a drawstring at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Unlined.
Soft, padded slippers in fabric with a glow-in-the-dark print. Soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
T-shirt in soft, striped cotton jersey with a round, ribbed neckline.
T-shirt in soft, striped cotton jersey with a round, ribbed neckline.

Set with a long-sleeved, wrapover bodysuit and a pair of trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with a text print on the front and press-studs at the sides and at the crotch. Trousers with an elasticated waist.

Set with a long-sleeved, wrapover bodysuit and a pair of trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with a text print on the front and press-studs at the sides and at the crotch. Trousers with an elasticated waist.
Straight-cut T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Straight-cut T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Gloves in a soft knit with reinforced sections in woven fabric and foldover cuffs. Fleece lining.

Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, two buttons at the top, saddle shoulders and short sleeves with ribbed trims. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.

Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, two buttons at the top, saddle shoulders and short sleeves with ribbed trims. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.

Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, two buttons at the top, saddle shoulders and short sleeves with ribbed trims. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.

Short dress in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Narrow, sewn-in tie belt at the waist, flap chest pockets with a button and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Cardigan in a fluffy jacquard knit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Straight-cut blouse in a soft Tencel™ lyocell weave with a small stand-up collar, V-neck and long wide sleeves with a button and flounce at the cuffs.
Wide jumper in a soft jacquard knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Slightly boxy jumper in a soft, chunky knit with low dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and rounded hems.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and rounded hems.

Trousers in soft cotton canvas with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, a coin pocket, back pockets and a pocket and loop on one leg. Gently tapered legs with knee patches.
Long-sleeved jumper in a knit containing some wool with a jacquard-knit motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hat in a soft, fine, patterned knit with a pompom on top, wide turn-up with a text motif, and detachable pile beard.
Hat in a soft jacquard knit with a pompom on top and a detachable, faux fur false beard at the bottom.
Earrings in textured metal. Length approx. 4 cm.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes and designs. Diameter from 3 cm to 8.5 cm.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes and designs. Diameter from 3 cm to 8.5 cm.
Metal rings in various designs, one with a sparkly stone and four with plastic stones.
Bracelets in various designs. Adjustable length.
Short necklace in metal with small round pendants. Adjustable length 39-47 cm.
Short necklace in metal with small round pendants. Adjustable length 39-47 cm.

Backpack in woven fabric with imitation leather details and a handle and drawstring at the top. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, one outer compartment and a flap with decorative metal buckles and concealed magnetic fasteners. Lined. Size 11x27x37 cm.

Backpack in woven fabric with imitation leather details and a handle and drawstring at the top. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, one outer compartment and a flap with decorative metal buckles and concealed magnetic fasteners. Lined. Size 11x27x37 cm.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with an extra-high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered and rubber text print on the front and embroidered appliqués on the sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered and rubber text print on the front and embroidered appliqués on the sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Metal hoop earrings with different pendants. Diameter from 1.5 cm to 2.5 cm.
Double-breasted coat in a felted wool blend with wide notch lapels and long dolman sleeves. Welt side pockets, an inner pocket and a single back vent. Lined. The wool content of the coat is recycled.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs.
Metal studs in various designs.
Metal studs in various designs.
Two-strand necklace of thin metal chains with metal pendants and plastic beads. Adjustable length approx. 38-45 cm.
Two-strand necklace of thin metal chains with metal pendants and plastic beads. Adjustable length approx. 38-45 cm.
Narrow metal rings in various designs.
Hoop earrings in metal with a decorative punched pattern, plastic beads and small pendants. Length 5 cm.

Romper suit in soft velour with press-studs at the back and double-layered cap sleeves, one layer in chiffon with a discreet foil print. Seam at the waist, gently tapered legs and smocking at the hems.
